Dua (Arabic): وَقَالُوا الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَذْهَبَ عَنَّا الْحَزَنَ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورُ شَكُورُ
Dua Translation: and they said "Praise be to Allah who has removed us from our sorrows. Indeed, our Lord is forgiving and appreciative."

Dua (Arabic): إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
Dua Translation: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

Dua (Arabic): فَفَرِحُوا۟ بِمَا عِندَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
Dua Translation: But they rejoice in what little knowledge they have, while being overwhelmed by that which they used to ridicule.

Dua (Arabic): اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الجُبْنِ وَالبُخْلِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ غَلَبَةِ الدَّيْنِ وَقَهْرِ الرِّجَالِ
Dua Translation: O Allah! I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, and I seek refuge in You from helplessness and laziness, and I seek refuge in You from cowardice and miserliness, and I seek refuge in You from being overcome by debt and being oppressed by men.

Dua (Arabic): أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَنِ الرَّحِيمِ
Dua Translation: I seek refuge in Allah from Satan.

Dua (Arabic): يا رب ارفع قلبي ويسر لي أمري، وأزل العقدة من لساني حتى يفهموا كلامي.
Dua Translation: O Allah! Lift up my heart and ease my task for me. Remove the impediment from my tongue so that they may understand my speech.

Dua (Arabic): سُبْحَانَ اللهِ
Dua Translation: "Glory is to Allah"

Dua (Arabic): لَآ إِلٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّيْ كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِيْنَ
Dua Translation: There is no god worthy of worship except You. You are free from imperfection. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.

Dua (Arabic): الحمد لله على كل شيء
Dua Translation: Thank you Allah for everything.

Dua (Arabic): اللهم طهر قلبي من كل سوء ، اللهم طهر قلبي من كل ما يبغضك، اللهم طهر قلبي من كل غلٍ وحقدٍ وحسد وكبر
Dua Translation: O Allah! Clean my heart of all evil. O Allah! Purify my heart from everything that displeases You. O Allah! Purify my heart from bitterness, malice, jealousy, and arrogance.

Dua (Arabic): أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ غَضَبِهِ وَعِقَابِهِ، وَشَرِّ عِبَادِهِ، وَمِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ وَأَنْ يَحْضُرُونِ
Dua Translation: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from His anger, His punishment, the evil of His slaves, the taunts of devils, and their presence.

Dua (Arabic): اللَّهُمَّ لاَ سَهْلَ إِلاَّ مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلاً وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلاً
Dua Translation: O Allah! Nothing is easy except what You make easy, and You make hardship easy if You will.

Dua (Arabic): اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّيْ عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
Dua Translation: O Allah! Help me remember You, be grateful to You, and worship You excellently.

Dua (Arabic): اللهم لَا تُعَلِّقْ قَلْبِي الضِّعِيفِ بِمَا لَيسَ لِي
Dua Translation: O Allah! Do not let my weak heart cling to what is not mine.

Dua (Arabic): اللهم بارك
Dua Translation: May Allah bless you.

Dua (Arabic): اللهم اجعلني من الطيبين وارزقني الطيبات/ اللهم اجعلني من الطيبات وارزقني الطيبين
Dua Translation: O Allah! Make me among the pure men and grant me pure women. / O Allah! Make me among the pure women and grant me pure men.

Dua (Arabic): رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي ۝ وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي ۝ وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِّن لِّسَانِي ۝ يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
Dua Translation: My Lord! Expand my heart, ease my task, and untie the knot from my tongue so they may understand my speech.

Dua (Arabic): اللهم اجعلني من الذين إذا أحسنوا استبشروا، وإذا أساءوا استغفروا
Dua Translation: O Allah! Make me among those who rejoice in good deeds and seek forgiveness for wrongs.

Dua (Arabic): اللهم أرِنا الحقَّ حقًّا وارزقنا اتِّباعَه، وأرِنا الباطلَ باطلًا وارزقنا اجتنابَه
Dua Translation: O Allah! Show us truth as truth- grant us adherence to it- show us falsehood as falsehood and grant us the ability to avoid it
Dua Reference: "Sunan Ibn Majah; Hadith 3976 – Authentic by Al-Albani"

Dua (Arabic): اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الخبث والخبائث
Dua Translation: "O Allah! I seek refuge in You from the male and female devils (evil and impure things)"

Dua (Arabic): رَّبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
Dua Translation: "My Lord! increase me in knowledge"

Dua (Arabic): حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
Dua Translation: "Sufficient for us is Allah and He is the best Disposer of affairs"

Dua (Arabic): اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن، والعجز والكسل، والجبن والبخل، وغلبة الدين وقهر الرجال
Dua Translation: "O Allah! I seek refuge in You from worry and sorrow from weakness and laziness from cowardice and miserliness and from being overwhelmed by debt and overpowered by others"

Dua (Arabic): اللهم إني أعوذ بك من العجز والكسل
Dua Translation: "O Allah! I seek refuge in You from incapacity and laziness"

Dua (Arabic): حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
Dua Translation: "Allah is sufficient for me; there is no deity except Him. I have placed my trust in Him and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne"

Dua (Arabic): اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الشك والريب، وأسألك يقينًا صادقًا
Dua Translation: "O Allah! I seek refuge in You from doubt and uncertainty and I ask You for true conviction"
Dua Reference: "Inspired by general prophetic supplications for certainty and clarity"

Dua (Arabic): اللهم إني أسألك حبك، وحب من يحبك، وحب العمل الذي يقربني إلى حبك
Dua Translation: "O Allah! I ask You for Your love- the love of those who love You and the love of deeds that bring me closer to Your love"

Dua (Arabic): اللهم لا سهل إلا ما جعلته سهلا، وأنت تجعل الحزن إذا شئت سهلا
Dua Translation: "O Allah! there is no ease except what You make easy and if You will You can make hardship easy"

Dua (Arabic): لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
Dua Translation: "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed I have been of the wrongdoers"

Dua (Arabic): وَقُولُوا حِطَّةٌ نَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ خَطَايَاكُمْ وَسَنَزِيدُ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
Dua Translation: "And say: 'Grant us relief!' We will forgive your sins and increase the reward for those who do good"

Dua (Arabic): اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الكبر والعجب والرياء والسمعة
Dua Translation: "O Allah! I seek refuge in You from arrogance self-admiration showing off and seeking fame"
Dua Reference: "Inspired by various prophetic supplications related to humility such as those in Sahih Muslim 2720 and Sunan Abu Dawood 5090"

Dua (Arabic): اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن، والعجز والكسل، والجبن والبخل، وغلبة الدين وقهر الرجال
Dua Translation: "O Allah! I seek refuge in You from worry and grief from weakness and laziness from cowardice and miserliness and from being overwhelmed by debt and overpowered by others"

Dua (Arabic): رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي
Dua Translation: "My Lord! expand for me my chest and ease my task for me"

Dua (Arabic): حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
Dua Translation: "Allah is sufficient for me; there is no deity except Him. I have placed my trust in Him and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne"
